Hi,

Recently, we encountered Tomcat crash on EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION. I attached error log.

need your help to identify the problem

text: Are you kidding? Your both Tomcat & Java version are stoneage. You should upgrade first.

this is provided by application provider infor , i will talk to them as well but are you able to find out the crashing reasons...

Regards

Jitender Srivastava

text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.

Added to which, that is a JVM bug.
